name: Galactic Missile Defense
description: Galactic Missile Defense is a shooter and tower defense game, where you must protect Earth from the invading Martians that declared war on our planet just because a space rover accidentally ruined their picnic!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card Storage: 75 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or later Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Graphics Card Storage: 2 GB available space
